title: Enterprise Data & Technology Architect
description:
As part of Ikano Group, the Ikano Bank vision is to create possibilities for better living, with the goal to simplify the everyday life of the many people. The Digital organization is where the Data & Analytics, Product, Development and Customer Studio teams comes to together to drive the transformation of Ikano Bank and develop compelling propositions for our customers and partners.



You will be part of Ikano Bank, where we create possibilities for a better living by delivering valuable financial services to both consumers and businesses through retailers, partnerships and directly. We do this with different perspectives, natural curiosity and long-term focus.



This is a unique chance to take great responsibility and create future opportunities for Ikano Bank. Let’s achieve great things together.



This is an position located at Ikano Bank’s office in Malmö or Stockholm.


### **Enterprise Data & Technology Architect**



At Ikano Bank we're amidst an exciting digital transformation, with an increasing number of individuals actively engaged in data and analytics initiatives across the organization. As an Enterprise Data & Technology Architect, you'll play a pivotal role in defining and maintaining the target data architecture and technology landscape within the Data & Analytics domain. Our goal is to advance our Enterprise Data Platform on AWS and other platforms, enhancing their capabilities to drive innovation and growth. You will set the conceptual roadmap for how to move from the current state to the target and support and guide the initiatives required for the transition. You will do this in close collaboration with architects for other domains, the data governance function, delivery teams and business representatives. You will have an active role in various decision forums, represent us to external partners (for example vendors and AWS) and create a great foundation for further development.



To excel in this role, a strong business acumen is essential, coupled with a deep understanding of our banking operations. You must possess the capability to translate business requirements seamlessly into innovative technology solutions. Effective presentation and communication skills within the Data & Analytics domain are paramount for success. Moreover, the ability to articulate business needs to solution architects, developers, and other technical personnel is crucial.



Additionally, it's imperative to maintain a forward-thinking approach, keeping an eye on emerging technologies and assessing their potential relevance to our operations. As Data & Analytics continues to evolve rapidly, you'll play a pivotal role in prioritizing initiatives and making strategic decisions that align with both business imperatives and technological capabilities, ensuring that our technological roadmap delivers substantial value to the Bank. You'll primarily engage in strategic and tactical tasks, but maintaining curiosity about and understanding operational dynamics is ingrained in our company culture and critical for your success.



This position is more than what meets the eye. You will get the chance to push boundaries and influence your daily work. All as part of a caring and open culture where we live our values, work hard, have fun and operate with a long-term perspective. You will be part of Ikano Bank, where we create possibilities for a better living by providing banking and financial services.



You will report to the Manager Domain Architecture and be part of the leadership team of the Data & Analytics organization, consisting of the Global Head of Data & Analytics, the Head of Data Delivery, the Data Governance Lead and the Head of Analytics. Together we will drive the data agenda in the bank, enabling Data & Analytics to be at the very core of how Ikano Bank operates, by enabling Ikano Bank to make data-driven, better and faster decisions at a lower cost.



The position is located in Malmö, Sweden.


**Key responsibilities for this role include:**


* Set and communicate the data architecture and data technology architecture standards and guidelines
* Utilize a reference data architecture to describe and communicate current state of data architecture
* Keep an up-to-date view on the technology architecture for the Data & Analytics domain (integration, warehouses, lakes, analytical tools, etc.)
* Define and maintain the target data architecture and the corresponding target technology architecture, document gaps and create conceptual, value driven, roadmap to close the gaps
* Facilitate the selection of tools and packages for all components in the Data & Analytics landscape
* Provide support to solution architects in the implementation of initiatives along the roadmap
* Represent the data & analytics domain in architecture boards and assess impact of initiatives in other domains on Data & Analytics
* Ensure that the architecture for new initiatives are aligned with the Enterprise Architectural roadmap and overall Ikano guidelines and target architecture

### **We offer you**



You will be operating at the very core of Ikano Bank, building new capabilities that is longed for in an area that is key for the Bank´s digital transformation. The explicit goal of IKANO Bank is to be a data driven bank, where the decision making and the business as a whole, is based on data. The Data & Analytics area is therefore highly prioritized in the Bank. As a part of the Data & Analytics organization you will belong to an organization, with highly skilled and motivated people, that is rapidly moving forward.



We work in an international environment, and you will get the chance to cooperate with colleagues from many different cultures. You will get the chance to push boundaries and are expected to challenge the status quo. All as part of a caring and open culture where we live our values, work hard, have fun and operate with a long-term perspective.


### **Are you the one for Ikano?**



We are looking for senior architect with wide experience, who has a strong understanding of solutions innovation. The ideal candidate has several years of experience working as a solution architect. You have an ability to dive into various solutions while developing new solutions/services and make strong contributions in architectural discussions. You should have passion for innovation; motivated by always looking for new technology trends, particularly in the data & analytics area. To be successful you must me highly collaborative and inspirational in how you coach other architects and senior development members with solution design.



Your adeptness at discerning patterns within complex issues, coupled with your common sense, positions you as the go-to individual for providing invaluable sanity checks in the realm of Data & Analytics.


**We believe that we are looking for someone with the following background:**


* Take ownership and take pride in understanding your stakeholders and the business you support
* Possess strong communication skills and can have discussions on different levels, ranging from developer to C-level
* Are structured and analytical and can conceptualize complex architectural issues.
* Have a minimum 5 years of experience in working with data / data technology architecture in an enterprise context
* Have experience in working with both Data (big data, DWH, data management, etc) and Analytics (BI, predictive, advanced)
* Several years of successful professional experience in Architecture design and implementation of platforms
* Banking understanding is a must
* Knowledge in BIAN model
* Core Banking platform (e.g. Cards, Loans and deposits) and Origination systems is an added advantage
* Knowledge on Monitoring, Vulnerability Scanning, and Patch Management & Deployment (added advantage)
* Ability to synthesize and clarify status through written or verbal communications. Both upwards and downwards in the programs, business analysts, program management and senior executives
* Can demonstrate knowledge about cloud trend in Data & Analytics (AWS is preferred)
* Knowledge and understanding of SW project/product execution and the external environment, 3rd party deliverables
* Fluent in English – spoken and written
* Ability to work in a team and within Ikano’s values


**And with emphasis on the below skills and attributes:**


* Ability to build, motivate, drive technical discussions
* Ability to take ownership
* Ability to delegate and divide the work
* Problem Solver, identifying areas for investigation
* Having a strong mindset to take technical ownership and understand business needs
* Short & long term risk management including mitigation planning
* Competitive benchmarking and looking out for new technology trends


We want our customers, partners and co-workers to choose us for what we stand for, what we deliver and how we deliver it. Three basic values guide our work: common sense and simplicity, working together, and daring to be different. These values should feel natural to you.


### **Join us now – together we will find a better way**



We look forward to receiving your application with a CV and cover letter no later than the 16th of September. Please note that we are unable to accept any applications via email. In this recruitment Ikano Bank cooperates with Case Consulting AB; If you have any questions regarding the position, please contact Recruitment Consultant Martin Godaly on +46 (0)708 700 183 or at mg@caseconsulting.se.



We respectfully decline any contact from recruitment or advertisement agencies.


### **About us**



Ikano Bank offers simple and attractive savings and loan products for consumers, sales support services for retailers, and leasing and factoring solutions for corporate customers. Ikano Bank has a presence in Sweden, Denmark, Finland, Norway, the UK, Poland, Germany, and Austria. Ikano Bank is part of Ikano Group, who is an international group of companies operating in the areas of banking, insurance, residential and retail. At Ikano, our vision is to create possibilities for better living. We do this by working together to create simple and meaningful solutions based on fair terms that bring value to our customers. Ikano Group was established in 1988 and is owned by the Kamprad family. Find out more about us on www.ikanogroup.com

title: Applikationssupport ekonomi medarbetare
description:
**Applikations/supportmedarbetare till IT Ekonomi**
---------------------------------------------------



New Wave Group är en tillväxtkoncern som skapar, förvärvar och utvecklar märkesvaror åt profilmarknaden (företagsmarknaden) och konsumentmarknaden (främst inom kläd-, accessoar- och gåvosektorn). New Wave äger varumärken som Orrefors, Kosta Boda, Craft och Sagaform.
  

New Wave etablerades år 1990 i Sverige och Norge och år 1994 i Finland. På dessa marknader är koncernen marknadsledande med en marknadsandel inom profilkläder på uppskattningsvis 30-35 procent. Koncernen ska nå synergier genom att samordna design, inköp, marknadsföring och distribution av koncernens kollektioner samt genom att utnyttja samordningsfördelar mellan koncernens varumärken. Koncernen ska verka inom profilmarknaden och detaljhandelsmarknaden för att få en god riskspridning.


#### **Arbetsuppgifter**



Supportera, hjälpa och stödja våra 30 bolag i Sverige och Europa med 2:nd line support. I rollen ingår att hjälpa kollegor i våra bolag med support frågor, uppsättning och vidareutbildning. Vi ger support för vårt affärstödssystem ASW/Enterprise, svarar på frågor kring hantering och hjälper användarna på olika sätt för att de ska kunna hantera och sköta sina arbetsuppgifter i applikationen. Det innebära kommunikation via Teams, telefon och besök till våra olika bolag. Vi supporterar även andra system som vi har centralt såsom; Qlikview, Medius, nShift. Även dokumentation i form av utbildningsmaterial etc. kommer att ingå i Din tjänst. Du kommer att ingå i ett energiskt team och jobba mycket tätt med våra interna och externa konsulter. Du kommer att lära dig mycket om olika länders regler och hantering av redovisning.



Just nu är vi mitt uppe i ett ERP bytte där vi går till M3 Cloud.


#### **Kvalifikationer**



Vi söker dig som har M3/Movex erfarenhet, gärna jobbat som superuser eller support avdelning. Inriktningen vi vill ha är finansdelarna:


* Ekonomiarbete med bra förståelse för ekonomiska processer
* Förståelse för helheten i ett företag
* Jobbat med reskontra/redovisning
* Applikationskunskap från ERP system gärna M3
* Goda kunskaper i engelska som är vårt koncernspråk

#### **Meriterande**


* Intresse för användbarhet och funktion i ERP system
* Krav att ha M3/Movex kunskap
* Mycket meriterande om du haft liknande roll tidigare som superuser, konsult eller ansvarig för ekonomiavdelning

#### **Personliga egenskaper**



Du är en lyhörd person som har god kommunikationsförmåga och är serviceinriktad. Du tycker om att ta utmaningar och se lösningar/möjligheter. Du har lätt för att lära och kunna formulera dig muntligt och skriftligt. Detta är en utmaning för dig som vill lära mycket, ser möjligheter och kan arbeta självständigt.



Placeringsort:  

Stenungsund, Göteborg eller Dingle.  

Välkommen med din ansökan, CV och personligt brev via mail till susanne.nilsson@nwg.seHar du frågor kring tjänsten är du välkommen att kontakta Susanne Nilsson, tel: 031-7128936

title: Client/Endpoint Specialist
description:
**C L I E N T / E N D P O I N T S P E C I A L I S T**  

**\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_**  

Full-time | Permanent

 **W H A T W E N E E D**  

We're looking for a Senior Client Specialist to join our Modern Work department. You will be a key player in driving the digital transformation for our clients. You will be responsible for both technical implementation and strategic consultation within Configuration Manager and Intune.  

  

**Examples of potential tasks/responsibilities:**  

* Designing and implementing client management solutions**,** focused on **Microsoft Intune** and **Configuration Manager**, optimizing our customers’ IT environments.
* Contributing to and further developing our client management services, continuously enhancing and streamlining clients' endpoint management.
* Supporting the **sales team** in **pre-sales activities**
* Acting as a technical advisor; creating proposals, meeting with clients, and ensuring the best solution for each customer.
* Leading projects from start to finish, ensuring seamless integration of solutions in both **cloud** and **hybrid environments.**
* Utilizing PowerShell scripting and automation to improve workflows and maintain secure, robust systems.

  

**C O U L D Y O U B E A M A T C H ?**  

**We believe our specialist has:**  

* 3–5 years of experience working as a consultant within **Microsoft Intune** and **Configuration Manager**.
* Strong technical knowledge of the **Microsoft 365** platform, with experience managing endpoints such as laptops, iPhones, and Android devices.
* Proficiency in **PowerShell** scripting
* Experience with **cloud and hybrid solutions**; knowledge from an on-premise perspective, as well as cloud based.
* The ability to act as a **strategic advisor**, offering customized solutions to meet clients’ unique needs

  

**It is a bonus if you have:**  

* Relevant certifications
* Experience with macOS
  

**We also believe that you are a person who:**  

- Has a "senior presence" - happy to offer advice and collaborate with others  

* Is passionate about tech, and particularly endpoint management (of course).
* Speaks fluent **Swedish** and **English**
* Above all, displays kindness in everything they do

  

**W H Y C H O O S E X E N I T ?**  

**Benefits**  

Xenit boasts a generous benefits package, including but not limited to: wellness allowance, health insurance, föräldralön bonus, ergonomic workplaces, recruitment bonuses, weekly employee surveys, etc.  

  

**Great colleagues**  

With us you will find spinning instructors, parkour practitioners, gamers, film geeks, woodworkers, amateur photographers, and graphic designers.  

With us, you are free to be who you are. Our workforce is so diverse, that one of the only things each person has in common is how interesting they are.
  

  

**Activities**  

Each quarter, we hold **Xenit Inspire** where employees are able to share specialist knowledge, information about cool projects, and take part in tasks centred around innovation - workshops and hackathons. We also offer annual conferences, team building and other group activities such as basketball, Gothenburg Lap, yoga and power walk.  

  

\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_

  

This year, Xenit earned the award for **Microsoft's Partner of the Year Sweden,** which is a pretty huge deal. Watch the full video on our career homepage.  

  

We were also awarded **"Career Company of 2024"**. This prestigious recognition underscores our commitment to fostering a workplace culture that values inclusivity, well-being, and growth.  

*"Xenit is an outstanding employer where corporate culture and well-being are at the center. Here, the employees are part of a warm and inclusive community where their well-being and well-being are prioritized. By offering an environment where collaboration, creativity and innovation are encouraged, employees can thrive and develop while contributing to the company's success."*  

Read more about Karriar Företagen here.  

  

If you have questions about the position or the recruitment process, you are welcome to contact our Head of Talent: Abigail Chapman
  

Read more here: https://xenit.se/

title: Software Engineer - DevOps
description:
**Company Description**
 H&M is a fashion brand that offers the latest styles and inspiration, from fashion pieces and unique designer collaborations to affordable wardrobe essentials. Our business idea is fashion & quality at the best price in a sustainable way. Learn more about H&M here.
   

  

**This is a full-time position with placement in Stockholm, Sweden.**
**Job Description**
 If building and maintaining technology platforms excites you, then this opportunity is for you! The API Platform team is looking for an experienced DevOps engineer who will play a critical role in designing, implementing and maintaining the deployments and integration processes for H&Ms API platform. The platform enables our product teams around the world to deploy software solutions that run independently. You will be part of a high-performance team that constantly aims to improve the experience of our end users and you. In this role, you will also be partnering with teams and areas to support our unit in driving the integration Platforms & Services mission and roadmap.
   

  

 Some of your
 **responsibilities** 
 will include:
   

  

* 60 % development in C#/.NET for DevOps pipelines, rest for other activities
* Main Responsibility: Adding and maintaining features in existing Azure DevOps pipelines
* Other activities include:
+ Work on ways to automate and improve , deployment and release processes
+ Identify technical problems in the pipelines, implement software updates and fixes
+ Analyse & develop technical specifications and architecture for solutions.
+ Ensure systems are safe and secure against cybersecurity threats
+ Implement industry best practices, strategies and troubleshooting for CI/CD, integration, build and deploy capabilities.
+ Deliver on time, demonstrating strong commitment to deliver on the team mission and agreed backlog


**Qualifications**
* 7+ experience in developing & testing applications/components with C#/.NET, including implementing Design Patterns & 3rd Party Frameworks
* 5+ years working with Cloud technologies (Azure, GCP)
* 5+ years of hands-on experience in implementing and managing Azure DevOps pipelines and YAML-based pipeline configurations
* Hands-on experience with Azure CLI, Bash Scripting, PowerShell & REST API
* Experience leveraging IaC (Infrastructure as Code) for deployment automation using Terraform, ARM template etc. on Microsoft Azure & Google Cloud Platform
* Good expertise and experience with DevOps services administration, monitoring, logging and troubleshooting of pipelines
* Substantial experience with version control software (Azure DevOps, Github etc.)
* Knowledge and experience in deployment using GitHub Actions is highly desirable
* Knowledge and experience working with Google Cloud Platform (GCP) is meriting
* Good to have experience with API management platform (Azure preferred)
* Preferred to have at least Azure Administrator (AZ104) and/or Developer (AZ204) certifications
* Azure Solution Architect (AZ305) and/or DevOps Engineer (AZ400) are strong plus!
* Experience with containerization and orchestration technologies (Docker and Kubernetes) is meriting
* Familiarity with Agile methodologies and tools like Jira/Confluence, Miro etc.


**Additional Information**
 Working with tech at H&M Group
   

  

 The fashion and retail industries are going through a transformation, driven by customers' technology and sustainability expectations. At H&M Group, we want to shape the future of fashion and lifestyle by harnessing the power of smart tech and data. With our 74-year history of innovation, we understand the need to collaborate and co-create with engineers and tech specialists around the world to achieve our vision.
   

  

 What we offer
   

  

 You are joining a unique value-driven culture, a large tech network and community where you can be yourself. Besides the obvious perks such as staff discount card, learning communities, wellness and parental benefits, there are a lot of opportunities to experiment and grow in the direction you want. Being a major player gives us countless opportunities to make a real impact and shape the future.
   

  

 H&M Group is committed to creating a diverse & inclusive environment and we are actively looking for qualified candidates irrespective of race, gender, gender identity, sexual orientation, ethnicity, religion, national origin, disability or age. Learn more about our I&D work https://youtu.be/veRbl9Cijts
   

  

 This is a full-time position based in Stockholm. Please apply as soon as possible but no later than 1st of October. We will review and interview applicants on-going. If you have questions, please contact Talent Acquisition Partner Hranda Khrystyna at khrystyna.hranda@hm.com

title: Affärsområdeschef Netops/Devops-team
description:
Är du redo att ta din karriär till nästa nivå? Hos IP-Solutions får du leda ett team av Sveriges främsta IT-specialister och vara en nyckelspelare i vår tillväxtresa. Vi är ett växande konsultbolag i hjärtat av Stockholm, där innovation och teknisk expertis möter affärsdriv.
 



  





**Din roll i korthet:** 




 • 
 **Leda och utveckla ett högpresterande team** 
 av konsulter inom Netops/Devops.
 



 • 
 **Driva affärsutveckling** 
 – från att etablera nya kontakter till att bygga och vårda långsiktiga kundrelationer.
 



 • 
 **Driva rekrytering och kompetensutveckling** 
 inom teamet.
 



 • 
 **Vara en strategisk partner** 
 i affärsutveckling och lösningspaketering.
 



 • 
 **Säkerställa medarbetarnöjdhet** 
 och bidra till en stark laganda.
 



 •  
 **Ta resultatansvar för affärsområdet** 
 , delta aktivt i ledningsgruppen och bidra till strategiska beslut för företagets övergripande utveckling.
 



  





**Vi söker dig som:** 




 • Har erfarenhet av
 **försäljning** 
 inom IT eller som
 **konsultchef** 
 .
 



 • Är tekniskt intresserad och vill utvecklas inom
 **Netops/Devops** 
 .
 



 • Är en driven ledare med förmåga att
 **inspirera och engagera** 
 ditt team.
 



 • Har erfarenhet av att bygga och utveckla långsiktiga affärsrelationer.
 



  





**Varför IP-Solutions?** 




 Hos oss får du en unik möjlighet att påverka och växa tillsammans med ett företag som strävar efter att vara ledande inom våra teknikområden. Vi är stolta över vår starka kultur som bygger på engagemang, nyfikenhet och kompetens. Vårt team består av några av Sveriges mest erfarna konsulter, och vi erbjuder en arbetsmiljö där din insats verkligen gör skillnad.
 



**Vad vi erbjuder:** 




 • En nyckelroll i ett växande företag med höga ambitioner.
 



 • Stöd från en engagerad ledningsgrupp och specialister inom ekonomi, rekrytering och affärsutveckling.
 



 • En dynamisk och innovativ arbetsmiljö där du kan växa professionellt och personligt.
 



  





**Om IP-Solutions** 




 IP-Solutions är ett konsultbolag inom tele- och datakommunikation samt Cloud, som erbjuder tjänster inom SW-utveckling, DevOps, nätverk och Tekniskt ledarskap. Bolaget grundades 1999, är personalägt och drivs av Glenn Sernbrandt. Huvudkontoret ligger på Kungsholmen i Stockholm. IP-Solutions har en stark ekonomi och är väl positionerat för fortsatt tillväxt. Kärnan i vår verksamhet är konsulternas tekniska expertis och mångåriga erfarenhet. Våra framgångsfaktorer inkluderar en stark kollegial gemenskap, en personlig approach i sälj och matchning, samt ett nära samarbete med våra kunder för att hitta de bästa lösningarna Kärnan i verksamheten är konsulternas tekniska expertis samt mångåriga erfarenhet och framgångsfaktorerna inkluderar den fina kollegiala gemenskap som finns.
 



  





 Vill du vara med och forma framtidens IT-lösningar inom Netops/Devops? Sök rollen som Affärsområdeschef hos IP-Solutions idag och bli en del av vårt framgångsrika team!
 


-
