title: Leadership Technical Program Manager, Google Meet
description:
**Minimum qualifications:**
* Bachelor's degree in a relevant field, or equivalent practical experience.
* 8 years of technical program management work experience.
* 5 years of experience in leadership role(s) with/without direct reports.


**Preferred qualifications:**
* 8 years of experience managing cross-functional/team projects.
* 5 years of supervisory experience.


**About The Job**
 Google's projects, like our users, span the globe and require managers to keep the big picture in focus while being able to dive into the unique engineering challenges we face daily. As a Technical Program Manager at Google, you lead complex, multi-disciplinary engineering projects using your engineering expertise. You plan requirements with internal customers and usher projects through the entire project lifecycle. This includes managing project schedules, identifying risks and clearly communicating them to project stakeholders. You're equally at home explaining your team's analyses and recommendations to executives as you are discussing the technical trade-offs in product development with engineers.
   

  

 Using your extensive technical and leadership expertise, you manage various Engineering-specific programs and teams.
   

  

 Google Meet has the mission to help consumers, educators, small businesses, Googlers, and companies leverage the power of videoconferencing to enhance their connections with friends, classmates, and co-workers.
   

  

 The Foundation team is focused on providing audio and video media, stunning reliability, security, and a setup enabling natural communications - like being in the same room.
   

  

 Google Cloud accelerates every organization’s ability to digitally transform its business and industry. We deliver enterprise-grade solutions that leverage Google’s cutting-edge technology, and tools that help developers build more sustainably. Customers in more than 200 countries and territories turn to Google Cloud as their trusted partner to enable growth and solve their most critical business problems.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Implement communications standards across a portfolio of programs including executive and key partner communications.
* Establish a reliable and visible cadence for program reviews, decision-making, prioritization, and Resource Stewardship (effective deployment of machine and people resources) whereby improvements such as efficiency and utilization gains are measurable and the impact can be felt organization wide.
* Lead a governance structure that drives effective executive decision-making. Ensure governance structure effectively exposes and mitigates dependencies.
* Seek out and identify change management opportunities that increase program velocity and which affect multiple teams. Apply governance over change management to ensure it’s used effectively.
* Define/manage a program portfolio solving problems that target high business impact for the organization and product area.


 Google is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer. We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity or Veteran status. We also consider qualified applicants regardless of criminal histories, consistent with legal requirements. See also Google's EEO Policy and EEO is the Law. If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation, please let us know by completing our Accommodations for Applicants form .

title: Customer Success Manager
description:
**Why join Bannerflow?** 




 Our mission is to accelerate creativity and collaboration for marketing teams, at scale and across channels. To deliver on this, we have defined five must-win battles that will guide us to success; People & Culture, Product-driven Revenue Growth, Successful International Expansion, Maintain & Grow our Commercial Journey, and Sustainable Tech Platform for the future.
 



 Bannerflow is a high-growth company and one of Europe's most exciting SaaS companies. We build a Creative Management Platform that allows enterprise brands to create, publish, analyze, and optimize advertising in-house, at scale. As part of the Bannerflow team, you will get the opportunity to work with a creative, enabling, and premium close-based architecture. Our creative management platform serves more than 6 billion ads each month, viewed on 500 million unique devices all over the world.
 



  





**About The Role** 




 We seek a dynamic and proactive Customer Success Manager (CSM) to join our team. In this role, you will manage a portfolio of approximately 35 enterprise customers within a specific market, ensuring successful onboarding, product adoption, and overall satisfaction with the Bannerflow marketing cloud platform. Your mission will include driving customer retention and revenue growth through strategic customer projects, quarterly business reviews, and maintaining high satisfaction levels.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities** 



* Facilitate a smooth onboarding experience for new customers.
* Drive increased usage and engagement with the Bannerflow platform.
* Lead key customer projects, collaborating with stakeholders to deliver success.
* Conduct regular reviews to assess and enhance customer satisfaction.
* Maintain and improve satisfaction levels across your customer portfolio.
* Achieve revenue growth through retention and upsell initiatives.



  





**Skills And Competencies** 



* Proven ability to manage and complete customer projects effectively.
* Strong skills in building and maintaining relationships with customers.
* Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English. Any additional language is a bonus.
* Ability to analyze and report on customer data to drive insights.
* Proficient in upselling and negotiating with customers.
* Demonstrates initiative to drive customer success.
* Prioritizes and meets the needs of customers.
* Effective in quickly resolving issues.
* Flexible and responsive to changing customer and business needs.
* Strong understanding of business principles to drive growth.
* Humble, grounded, and collaborative attitude.



  





**Why join us?** 




 We live alongside our values of Collaboration, Passion, and Challenge; with many events going on at Bannerflow such as Health Month, after works, inspiration sessions, workouts, and hackathons, there’s something for everyone.
 



 We are committed to building a diverse and inclusive team and welcome applications from candidates of all backgrounds, experiences, and abilities.
 



 We offer a hybrid workplace and a competitive compensation package including pension according to ITP1, health allowance, parental leave top-up, and health care insurance.

title: Guidewire Cloud Architect
description:
**Role** 
 – Lead Consultant
 



**Technology** 
 – Guidewire Cloud Architecture
 



**Location** 
 – Stockholm, Sweden
 



**Compensation** 
 – Competitive (including bonus)
 



  





**Job Description** 




 Today, the corporate landscape is dynamic and the world ahead is full of possibilities! None of the amazing things we do at Infosys would be possible without an equally amazing culture, the environment where ideas can flourish and where you are empowered to move forward as far as your ideas will take you.
 



  





 At Infosys, we assure that your career will never stand still, we will inspire you to build what’s next and we will navigate further together. Our journey of learnability, values and trusted relationships with our clients continue to be the cornerstones of our organization and these values are upheld only because of our people.
 



  





**Your role** 




 In the role of a Lead Consultant, you will anchor the engagement effort for assignments, all the way from business process consulting and problem definition to solution design, development and deployment. You will be pivotal to problem definition and discovery of the overall solution and guide teams on project processes, deliverables.
 



  





 As a thought leader in your domain, you will be the key advisor to architecture and design reviews. You will anchor business pursuit initiatives, client training, in-house capability building. You will have the opportunity to shape value-adding consulting solutions that enable our clients to meet the changing needs of the global landscape.
 



  





**Required** 



* 12-15 years of IT experience and 7+ years of experience in leading and solutioning Guidewire platform Implementation both On-prem and Cloud
* Experience working in all the Guidewire Centers like Policy, Billing, Claims and Contact Centers
* Working knowledge in GW Digital applications integration using Edge API, APD Tools
* Strong Understanding of GW Cloud Versions
* Experience in solutioning implementations like New Implementation, Application Development and Maintenance as well as Technical Migration/upgrade
* Need to have consulting and advisory skills to provide suggestions to customer on new Projects/initiatives, areas for improvement, best practices etc.,
* Batch process, Guidewire Messaging framework, OOTB plugins.
* Working knowledge on GOSU script, GIT – Source Code management



  





**Preferred** 



* Git repository, Service now
* Good communication skill and should be able to adapt in Client Implementation
* Experience in Project delivery methodologies (Agile, SAFe,)
* Swedish Speaking



  





**Personal** 




 Besides the professional qualifications of the candidates we place great importance in addition to various forms personality profile. These include:
 


* High analytical skills
* A high degree of initiative and flexibility
* High customer orientation
* High quality awareness
* Excellent verbal and written communication skills



  





**About Infosys** 




 Infosys is a global leader in next-generation digital services and consulting. We enable clients in 46 countries to navigate their digital transformation. With over three decades of experience in managing the systems and workings of global enterprises, we expertly steer our clients through the many next of their digital journey. We do it by enabling the enterprise with an AI-powered core that helps prioritize the execution of change. We also empower the business with agile digital at scale to deliver unprecedented levels of performance and customer delight. Our always-on learning agenda drives their continuous improvement through building and transferring digital skills, expertise and ideas from our innovation ecosystem.
 



**Visit www.infosys.com to see how Infosys can help your enterprise navigate your next.** 




  





**All aspects of employment at Infosys are based on merit, competence and performance. We are committed to embracing diversity and creating an inclusive environment for all employees. Infosys is proud to be an equal opportunity employer.**

title: Platform Solutions Specialist
description:
**This is Mevisio** 




*Mevisio is a fast-growing SaaS company offering a low-code platform that digitizes management and collaboration in the manufacturing industry.* 




  





 We provide a digital alternative to the physical whiteboards traditionally used for daily team meetings on the shop floor, with applications extending to general operations management and other Lean Manufacturing practices. The Mevisio Platform is a tool for leaders and team members to help them work smarter and more efficiently with the help of visualization and improved communication. Mevisio is highly customizable to the specific requirements of each client, including layout of boards and integrations with other systems, that allows the platform to solve the different needs of each company.
 



  





 Our main clientele comprises large enterprise industries, globally operating companies, and we've expanded our user base to over 50 countries in just a couple of years and there is much more to come!
 



  





*⚡️ We are revolutionizing the way manufacturing industries operate. Sounds cool, right?* 




  





**Why Mevisio?** 




 Walking into the office of Mevisio you will meet passionate, collaborative and kind people, and a fast-growing SaaS company. We are about to visualize the manufacturing industry and redefine its future, to succeed - we need more awesome people like YOU in our team!
 



  





 We work hard to create a workplace where we feel motivated and engaged and we act according to our values Customer First, Better Together, People Matters and Aim High! We have a fantastic platform and market to conquer - let’s do that together! 🎆
 



  





**What will you do?** 




 As our Platform Solutions Specialist in the Solutions team, you'll have the chance to work closely with the manufacturing world, helping our customers to build and implement enterprise applications to be used on sites all over the world. You will be the technical expert of customization and play an important role to help managers and their teams to reach operational excellence. Your tasks:
 



  





 🔸 Configuring our low-code platform to our customers needs
 



 🔸 Act as project manager between our customers and sales team
 



 🔸 Integrate the platform with other systems
 



 🔸 Be involved in the implementation project together with the customer
 



 🔸 Attend customer workshops at the manufacturing sites internationally
 



 🔸 Second or 3rd line support to our customers
 



 🔸 Write technical documentation in our platform
 



  





**What we think you will bring to us!** 




 🔸 Bachelor’s degree in engineering or similar (industrial, manufacturing...)
 



 🔸 Or consulting experience within IT, industrial automation or operational excellence
 



 🔸 Familiar with setting up integrations between systems
 



 🔸 Basic experience in JavaScript and database development
 



 🔸 Practical experience of working in or close to manufacturing
 



 🔸 Fluent in English on a professional level, German too is a plus
 



 🔸 Team-oriented approach
 



 🔸 Service-mindset
 



  





**Other perks and benefits** 




 🚆 Near public transit
 



 🏖️ 6 weeks of vacation
 



 📈 Pension contribution
 



 🪐 Development opportunities
 



 🔕 Flexible working hours
 



 👨‍👩‍👧 Work-life balance
 



 👟 Gym around the corner
 



 🎊 Social gatherings
 



 🏢 Central office
 



 🧑🏾‍💻 New tech gear
 



 ☕️ Free Coffee/Tee and breakfast every day
 



  





**Sounds interesting?! You know what to do then!** 
 👇🏻

title: Senior Software Engineer
description:
Are you passionate about solving complex problems and driving innovation? As a Senior Software Engineer, you’ll take ownership of designing and developing high-impact software solutions. If you thrive in fast-paced environments, enjoy working with cutting-edge technologies, and want to make an impact across multiple domains, this is the role for you.
 



  





**About the Role** 




 You will lead development efforts on both new products and significant enhancements to existing ones. This role is agnostic to specific tools and technologies, so whether you specialize in Python, JavaScript, TypeScript, or have expertise in AI, Machine Learning (ML), Cloud Computing, or modern frameworks, you’ll have the opportunity to contribute meaningfully. You’ll work on large-scale applications, collaborate across teams, and mentor others, driving results in an innovative and fast-paced environment.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities** 



* **Architect and build** 
 : Design and deliver clean, maintainable, high-performance code across various languages and tools, driving new features and products.
* **Collaborate cross-functionally** 
 : Work closely with product teams, designers, and stakeholders to ensure our software meets business goals, compliance standards, and scales efficiently.
* **Innovate and iterate** 
 : Continuously improve software through user feedback, testing, and iterative releases.
* **Mentor and lead** 
 : Participate in code reviews, mentoring team members, and promoting best practices.
* **Leverage modern tools** 
 : Utilize a range of technologies, such as AI, ML, cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP), CI/CD pipelines, microservices architecture, and databases, to enhance performance and scalability.



  





**What We're Looking For** 



* Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or related field.
* **5+ years of experience** 
 in software engineering, with proficiency in at least one language such as Python, JavaScript, TypeScript, Go, Rust, or similar.
* **Hands-on experience** 
 with large-scale, distributed systems, and familiarity with AI, ML, cloud platforms, and DevOps tools.
* Expertise in
 **Agile and Scrum methodologies** 
 , with a proven track record of delivering projects on time.
* Knowledge of modern development practices such as containerization (Docker, Kubernetes), CI/CD, and serverless architectures is a plus.
* A team player who excels in collaborative environments, able to manage multiple priorities and projects.



  





**Why You’ll Love Working Here** 



* **Impact** 
 : Your work will directly influence key business outcomes and the experience of thousands of users across various industries.
* **Growth** 
 : We offer ongoing learning opportunities and mentorship, giving you the tools to advance in your career.
* **Culture** 
 : Join a team that values innovation, collaboration, and continuous improvement in a supportive, dynamic environment.
* If you’re ready to lead exciting projects and push the boundaries of technology, we want to hear from you.

title: Regional Technical Consultant in Solar Energy
description:
**ALSO looks forward to working with you as a** 




  




**Regional Technical Consultant in Solar Energy** 

**Do you have technical experience in the energy sector? .....** 




**This position requires a strong blend of technical knowledge, sales skills, and customer relationship management.** 




  





**ALSO is a European distributor of green energy inc. inverters and energy storage systems and now we strengthen our local Nordic solar energy team with experienced technical pre-sales/aftersales person to support our customers.** 




  





**Main tasks** 




 In this position you work independently, within a small but driven team, mainly for the Nordic region. An important part of the position is to provide technical advice and support our resellers, installers and their end users in the field of solar energy inverters and energy storage (batteries) from the Huawei portfolio that we offer.
 



  
 


* Provide technical support and advice on sustainable energy solutions in the field of solar inverters and battery storage to sales colleagues within the ALSO Nordics.
* Build and maintain strong relationships with existing and potential customers, providing ongoing support, troubleshooting assistance, and addressing any concerns or issues that may rise.
* Be technical point of contact and advisor for our resellers, installers, and their end customers.
* Stay up to date on relevant market trends and the latest products.
* Participate in events, fairs, roadshows, business meetings and keep trainings and certification workshops.
* Do necessary technical pre-sales and after-sales technical certifications which required by vendors.



  
 



**Your profile** 



* Completed education in Electrical Engineering
* You have several years of technical work experience in the energy sector (for example as an installer of Solar Energy & Battery Energy Storage System (BESS)
* You have some knowledge of the energy sector (solar energy and energy storage) and would like to delve deeper into this
* You have a commercial mindset, and you are excellent at building relationships
* You speak English at a professional level and preferable one or more Nordic language
* You have a positive mindset and a desire to learn
* You can work independently but recognize the benefits of collaboration
* You should expect some travelling to supporting our Nordic customers
* You are locating preferable either in Sweden or Denmark, but Norway and Finland are also considerable



  
 



**We offer…..** 



* A very independent and challenging full-time job
* A competitive salary, depending on your knowledge and experience
* A fantastic workplace with good colleagues and fun environment to work
* A dynamic, versatile, and international work environment
* Nice offices in Stockholm, Copenhagen, Oslo and Tampere
* Flexibility to work at home and at offices
* Be part of a successful and fast-growing company in renewable/solar energy industry



  
 



 We look forward to hearing from you!
 



  
 



 If you have any question regarding the role please reach out to Benny Johansen, Energy Sales Director – benny.johansen@also.com

title: Principal Solutions Sales Executive - Manage Network Solutions
description:
*Are you ready to redefine the network solutions landscape? Do you want to shape the future of digital infrastructure in the Nordics? Join us at GlobalConnect as a Principal Solutions Sales Executive – Managed Network Solutions, where your expertise can lead the way in technological advancement.*
 As a Principal Solutions Sales Executive at GlobalConnect, your day-to-day will be filled with engaging conversations, strategic planning, and the creation of network solutions that truly resonate with our customers. You'll join a newly established and innovative team that plays a crucial role in GlobalConnect’s growth journey. This is your opportunity to be a key part of our sales initiatives, starting with identifying new opportunities and building your own portfolio. With a solid understanding of network infrastructure, you'll guide clients through complex decisions, using your knowledge to offer standardised solutions that feel tailored to their needs.
   

  

**What will you do?**
* Develop and maintain a portfolio of under 20 customers, focusing on both new and existing relationships.
* Engage in in-depth technical discussions to understand customer needs and design tailored network solutions, using your deep understanding of vendors and products to find price-optimal solutions for our customers.
* Collaborate closely with Solution Management to ensure that the technical aspects of solutions meet customer expectations and align with financial goals.
* Present and articulate complex network solutions to both technical and non-technical stakeholders as well as engage in high-level discussions with C-suite to build trust and convey the value of our network solutions.
* Oversee the entire sales process, ensuring a smooth and positive experience from initial contact to delivery.


**Why GlobalConnect?** 
 At GlobalConnect, we’re more than just a digital infrastructure company; we’re a team dedicated to making a difference. You'll be part of a forward-thinking environment that values innovation, collaboration, and personal growth. This is a unique opportunity to join a newly formed team that's integral to GlobalConnect’s growth strategy. We believe in offering standardized products that meet specific customer needs, giving them a customized feel. With the support of a team of experts and the freedom to design and implement solutions that add real value to our customers, GlobalConnect is the place to elevate your career.
   

  

**To excel in this role, you need:**
* Extensive experience with network solutions, particularly with vendors like Aruba and Cisco.
* Proven experience in sales, specifically with network solution products in business-to-business markets.
* Strong business insight with the ability to convey technical concepts to a diverse audience.
* The ability to design comprehensive network solutions that align with customer and commercial needs.


*If you're ready to create value through innovative network solutions and build lasting customer relationships, we encourage you to apply and join us on this exciting journey.* 
*Let’s shape the future together at GlobalConnect.*

title: Supporttekniker till Sveriges största statliga forskningsfinansiär!
description:
Vi söker nu en passionerad supporttekniker som vill arbeta på en arbetsplats som verkligen gör skillnad! Hos vår kund kommer du inte bara att lösa tekniska problem – du kommer också att vara en del av en organisation som ligger i framkant av svensk forskning och innovation. Om du är redo att ta nästa steg i din karriär och vill vara med och skapa förutsättningar för Sveriges forskningsframgångar, tveka inte att söka denna spännande tjänst som supporttekniker!
 



  

**Plats :**
 Stockholm
 



  

**Jobbkategori :**
 Kundtjänst
 



  

**Omfattning :**
 Heltid
 



  

**Startdatum :**
 Omgående
 



  

**Typ av uppdrag :**
 Konsultuppdrag
   




**Om tjänsten**

 Vår kund är Sveriges största statliga forskningsfinansiär, en organisation som stödjer forskning av högsta kvalitet inom alla vetenskapsområden. Här arbetar du i hjärtat av forskningsvärlden, där banbrytande idéer föds och utvecklas. Du kommer att vara en viktig kugge i maskineriet som gör att forskningen kan fortsätta driva samhället framåt.
   

 Här blir du snabbt en självklar del av en inspirerande och dynamisk miljö, omgiven av engagerade kollegor som brinner för att forskning ska komma till nytta i samhället. Här värdesätts samarbete, men det finns även stort utrymme för självständigt arbete och personligt ansvar.
 


  


  

**Du erbjuds**



  

  
* Chansen att vara med och stötta forskning som bidrar till samhällsutveckling.
  
* Arbeta i en miljö där teknik och vetenskap möts, och där ditt arbete gör skillnad.
  
* En utvecklande roll där ingen dag är den andra lik.
  

  


**Arbetsuppgifter**
  
* Självständigt lösa problem som första linjens supporttekniker.
  
* Administrera konton, behörigheter och hantera konton via AD Basic och Entra ID.
  
* Arbeta med grundläggande funktioner i M365 och Intune.
  
* Förbereda och underhålla datorer (Windows 10 och 11) samt mobila enheter (iPhone och Samsung).
  
* Hantera VPN-anslutningar och teknisk utrustning i konferensrum.
  

  


**Vi söker dig som**
  
* Tidigare arbetat i en liknande roll inom first line-support.
  
* Du är van vid att arbeta med fileshare och kan grunderna i system som används för att dela filer och information.
  
* Erfarenhet av Active Directory.
  
* Grundläggande kunskap om VPN.
  
* Erfarenhet av hantering och support inom Microsoft365 och Intune.
  
* Erfarenhet av teknik i konferensrum
   

  

**För att lyckas i rollen har du följande personliga egenskaper:**
  
* Är lösningsorienterad och trivs med att arbeta självständigt, samtidigt som du vet när det är dags att eskalera ärenden till andra linjens support.
  
* Har ett starkt serviceinriktat mindset och förstår vikten av att hålla en hög servicenivå.
  
* Är van att arbeta i en varierande miljö och snabbt kan anpassa dig till nya tekniska utmaningar.
  


  

  

**Vår rekryteringsprocess**
  


 Denna rekryteringsprocess hanteras av Academic Work och vår kunds önskemål är att alla frågor rörande tjänsten skickas till Academic Work.
 


  


 Vi tillämpar löpande urval och kommer plocka ner annonsen när tillräckligt många kandidater har nått slutskedet i rekryteringsprocessen. Rekryteringsprocessen innehåller två urvalstest: ett personlighetstest och ett test i kognitiv förmåga. Testerna är ett verktyg för att kunna hitta den kandidat med högst potential för tjänsten samt främja jämlikhet, mångfald och en rättvis rekryteringsprocess.
   




**Bli en del av Academic Work**

 Som konsult för Academic Work erbjuds du stora möjligheter att växa professionellt och knyta värdefulla kontakter för framtiden. Du får en konsultchef som stöttar dig under resans gång och får ta del av olika förmåner, bl.a. möjlighet till kompetensutveckling i form av en grundläggande hållbarhetsutbildning.
 


 Läs mer om vårt konsulterbjudande här
   

**Har du frågor om tjänsten?**

 Filippa Danell Karlberg eller någon av kollegorna i rekryteringsteamet svarar dig gärna på sth2@academicwork.se Ange annons-ID i ditt mail: 15106990

title: Säkerhetsspecialist IT
description:
*Agria Djurförsäkring befinner sig på en spännande resa på väg mot målet att bli Europas största djurförsäkringsbolag.* 
*För oss på Agrias Utvecklingsavdelning innebär det många roliga utmaningar.*
*– vi moderniserar vår utvecklingsplattform, våra arbetssätt (DevSecOps) och vår IT-arkitektur. För att stärka upp vårt utvecklings och säkerhetsarbete söker vi nu en specialist inom IT-säkerhet.*
*Delar du dessutom vårt intresse för djur?* 
*Då kan du vara den vi söker!*
**Om jobbet**
 Vi söker nu dig som vill arbeta operativt med IT-säkerhet hos oss på Agria. Din roll kommer att vara Säkerhetsspecialist- IT. Du kommer att vara placerad i ett team med andra funktionsansvariga inom IT området och ingå i teamet Användarstöd & Betalningar inom gruppen IT & Quality Assurance (QA). I rollen kommer du att arbeta brett, såväl strategiskt som operativt med IT- säkerhetsarbete. Arbetet och ansvaret avser både Agria Sveriges verksamhet samt flera av våra internationella verksamheter och våra dotterbolag.
   

  

 I den här rollen behöver du vara en prestigelös genomförare som trivs med att arbeta självständigt med att driva genomförandet av IT-säkerhetsarbetet. Du som söker rollen gillar att arbeta såväl med detaljerna som med att ta ansvar för att säkerställa att vi arbetar i enlighet med våra uppsatta IT och utvecklingsprocesser utifrån våra etablerade säkerhetsriktlinjer.
   

  

 En del i arbetet kommer att innefatta koordinering av våra säkerhetstester tillsammans med interna och externa säkerhetsgranskare. Utifrån det arbetet kommer du sedan att ansvara för att driva resultatet vidare i egenskap av beställare av säkerhetsåtgärder.
   

  

 Du kommer att arbeta med ett brett nätverk inom såväl Agria som Länsförsäkringar AB, samt med våra leverantörer.
   

  

 I rollen kommer du att bistå i arbetet med att analysera behovet av våra IT-säkerhetslösningar och vårt arbete med att utforma skräddarsydda lösningar som möter framtida krav. Du kommer att arbeta nära våra tekniska experter, verksamheten och andra intressenter för att lösa komplexa säkerhetsfrågor och säkerställa att vi har en trygg och säker digital miljö för våra målgrupper där du är en gatekeeper som vågar ställa krav.
   

  

**Vem är du?**
 Vi söker dig som har en gedigen bakgrund inom IT-säkerhetsområdet och eller IT-säkerhetsarkitektur förvärvad genom arbetslivserfarenhet eller i kombination av utbildning och arbetslivserfarenhet. Du har minst fem års relevant arbetslivserfarenhet inom området. Det innebär att du arbetat som funktionellt ansvarig inom IT säkerhet eller i en motsvarande roll tidigare.
   

  

 Vi ser det som en självklarhet att du som söker har arbetat med IT-säkerhet utifrån ISO-27000 serien för informationssäkerhet, cybersäkerhet och dataskydd samt att du har god förmåga att uttrycka dig i tal och skrift på svenska och engelska.
   

  

 Vi söker dig som har nedan erfarenheter och kompetenser:
   

  

* Certifiering inom IT-säkerhet t.ex. ISC2 – CISSP/ISSAP, Ethical hacker eller ISACA-CISM/CISA
* God kännedom inom ett eller flera av följande områden: IAM, PKI, nätverksinfrastruktur, serverinfrastruktur, katalogtjänster, plattformar för virtualisering, loggning, applikationssäkerhet, klientsäkerhet och molntjänster
* God kännedom om vilka möjligheter och begränsningar som gäller avseende lösningsval för svenska myndigheter
* Erfarenhet av att driva säkerhetsfrågor mot leverantörer såsom vid kravställning, uppföljning, förfrågning och utvärdering
* Utrett och analyserat IT-säkerhetsincidenter
* Erfarenhet av säkerhet i OT-miljöer
* Erfarenhet av arbete med AWAF
* Hantera sårbarheter på servrar
* Hantera sårbarheter inom cloud operations


 Det är meriterande om du har erfarenhet av:
   

  

* Försäkringsverksamhet eller liknande regelverksstyrd verksamhet så som bank/finans
* Konkret DevOps-arbete
* IBMi


**Om oss**
*Välkommen till Agria Djurförsäkring – en plats* 
*där vi skapar trygghet för djur och människor. Allt vi gör, gör vi för djuren. Det genomsyrar hela vår medarbetarkultur och märks i alla beslut vi fattar. Vi tror på att människor med en genuin passion för djur är nyckeln till att förmedla vårt erbjudande och att upprätthålla våra mål, mission och löften.*
*Vi vill bidra till en kreativ och lärande miljö där du som vill utveckla dig själv och verksamheten ska kunna göra det. En miljö där vi som arbetsgivare ger dig rätt stöd och ledarskap. Tillsammans skapar vi en inkluderande arbetsplats att trivas i och vi välkomnar alla, oavsett bakgrund.*
 Agria växer i Europa och har idag verksamhet i Sverige, Norge, Finland, Danmark, Storbritannien, Tyskland, Frankrike, Irland och Nederländerna. På Agria arbetar cirka 650 medarbetare. I koncernen ingår även dotterbolaget Agria Vet Guide som erbjuder digital veterinärrådgivning.
   

  

*Var med oss på resan att skapa Europas största och mest valbara djurförsäkringsbolag för att skapa trygghet för fler djur och människor.*
**Mer information**
*Låter det spännande? Då vill vi veta mer om dig! Välkommen med din ansökan redan idag. Vi arbetar löpande med denna rekrytering och kan komma att tillsätta tjänsten innan sista ansökningsdag.*
*Hos oss är du med och påverkar ditt arbete – hela kulturen bygger på en hög grad av självledarskap, eget lärande och utveckling. Tycker du om att leda dig själv och utveckla din fulla potential kommer du att trivas hos oss. Vi är en arbetsgivare som vill bidra till ett hållbart arbetsliv genom att erbjuda sjukvårdsförsäkring, friskvårdsbidrag och tjänstepension i anställningen. Bra anställningsvillkor och ett förmånligt försäkringsskydd till dig och familjen är andra exempel.* 
*Vi utvecklar ett flexibelt arbetssätt, med en god företagskultur och tydliga värderingar skapar vi en attraktiv arbetsplats för alla att trivas i. Välkommen med din ansökan!*
**Sista ansökningsdag: 2024-10-11**

title: Senior Identity Consultant/Architect
description:
**S E N I O R I D E N T I T Y C O N S U L T A N T
   

  

 \_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_**
 Full-time | Permanent
   

  

**A B O U T X E N I T**
 Xenit is a growth company which specializes in Cloud and modern work. We are currently 100+ consultants split between our Goteborg and Stockholm offices. Our committed employees inspire, challenge and encourage each other, while providing extensive value for our customers.
   

  

**W H A T W E N E E D 🙏🏻**
 We are looking for a
 **Senior Identity Consultant/Architect** 
 to join our Collaboration Team here at Xenit. You will take a leading role within the Identity and Security space, taking our customers from planning stages, through implementation and beyond.
   

  

**Examples Of Potential Tasks**
* Designing and implementing Identity and Access management solutions using Microsoft Entra ID and Entra Governance
* Conducting assessments of clients' existing Identity infrastructure and providing recommendations for improvements
* Providing guidance on best practices for securing identities and ensuring compliance with industry standards
* Delivering training and workshops to clients on identity-related topics and technologies.
* Troubleshooting and resolve Identity and Access issues; demonstrating a solid understanding of Microsoft Cloud security features.


**💚**
**C O U L D Y O U B E A M A T C H ?**
**We Believe Our Next Senior Identity Consultant Has**
* Extensive experience in designing and implementing identity and access solutions within the Microsoft Cloud; including Privileged Identity Management (PIM).
* Proven expertise in Microsoft Entra ID
* A good understanding of Microsoft Cloud technologies, as well as hybrid environments
* Knowledge of modern work practices, cloud-based architectures, and security protocols.
* Strong analytical skill - the ability to design scalable and secure identity solutions
* Experience with taking a leading role in identity-related projects
* Relevant certifications in Microsoft technologies
* Experience with scripting and automation for identity-related tasks using PowerShell, Python, or similar language


**It Is a BONUS If You Have**
* Experience working with a variety of identity providers beyond Microsoft, such as AWS, Okta, or others.
* Experience working with SharePoint Online and the Power Platform.
* Familiarity with solutions in multi-cloud environments and/or multi tenant organizations.
* Certifications in additional identity-related technologies or platforms.
* A drive to share knowledge with others, either through blogs, LinkedIn posts, or through presentations at events.
* Experience working in consulting roles, engaging directly with customers
* Experience from working with Business to Customer (B2C) environments


**We Also Believe That You Are a Person Who**
* Acts on their own initiative, makes things happen and takes responsibility for their work
* Has a passion for identity/security and for protecting people's data
* Has a methodical and structured way of working
* Can understand/analyze complex issues quickly
* Collaborates effectively with others and builds good relationships with both customers and colleagues
* Enjoys sharing knowledge and experiences in order to support colleagues in reaching common goals
* Fluent in spoken and written Swedish and English
* Above all else, displays kindness and compassion in everything they do 💕


**💚**
**W H Y C H O O S E X E N I T ?**
**Benefits 🎁**
 Xenit boasts a large benefits package, including but not limited to, a wellness allowance, health insurance, föräldralön bonus, ergonomic workplaces, recruitment bonuses, weekly employee surveys, etc.
   

  

**Super interesting colleagues 🎉**
 With us you will find spinning instructors, parkour practitioners, gamers, art historians, rugby players, puzzle maniacs, film geeks and much more.
   

  

 With us, you are free to be who you are. Our workforce is so diverse, that one of the only things each person has in common is an incredible drive and passion for what they do.
   

  

**Activities ⛹🏻**
 Each quarter, we have
 **Xenit Inspire** 
 where employees are able to share specialist knowledge, information about cool projects, and take part in tasks centered around innovation - workshops and hackathons. We also offer annual conferences, team building and other group activities such as basketball, Gothenburg Lap, yoga and Power Walk.
   

  

 Xenit was also recently awarded
 **"Career Company of 2024"** 
 . This prestigious recognition underscores our commitment to fostering a workplace culture that values inclusivity, well-being, and growth.
   

  

*"Xenit is an outstanding employer where corporate culture and well-being are at the center. Here, the employees are part of a warm and inclusive community where their well-being and well-being are prioritized. By offering an environment where collaboration, creativity and innovation are encouraged, employees can thrive and develop while contributing to the company's success."*
 Read more about Karriar Företagen here.
   

  

 If you have questions about the position or the recruitment process, you are welcome to contact our Head of Talent: Abigail Chapman 💌
   

  

 Read more here: https://xenit.se/
   

  

 Xenit's goal is not only to become Sweden's leading cloud partner, but to be Sweden's kindest cloud partner.
   

  

 Our theory is that satisfied workers produce satisfying work, and so we aim to create a working environment in which our employees can thrive; working independently, flexibly and happily.
   

  

 We are happy with hybrid remote working, encourage collaboration between offices and freedom in choosing devices/equipment and working hours.
   

  

 Why not find out more about us?
   

  

*Welcome to Xenit!*

title: Systems Programmer
description:
We believe this is an opportunity for either an early-career professional or a seasoned developer to learn and reach personal growth within system programming in Unreal engine 5. You will focus on maintaining and enhancing the game system infrastructure within a team that thrives on collaboration. We work remotely, leveraging the magic of Discord to stay connected and efficient.
 



  




**Responsibilities:** 
* Identify and address performance optimization opportunities
* Implement requests from the team and system functionality
* Propose solutions for project wide code issues and help create a more stable product
* Develop and maintain backend systems and integrate the game with third-party systems
* Build and manage cloud-based systems



  




**Qualifications:** 

 We’re looking for a curious mind that embraces challenges with a growth mindset. The “how does this work, and how can I learn more” attitude is highly regarded here. While collaboration is key in this role, we also value your ability to tackle problems within your domain independently.
 



  




* Proficiency in C++ programming or extensive experience in other backend programming languages
* Strong debugging skills
* Knowledge of programming methodologies like design patterns



  





 At Walker Labs, we put value in our team. We offer competitive salaries, encourage collaboration and entrust our employees with creative agency and ownership. We also pride ourselves in having a healthy work-life balance, and offer flexibility with family commitments and other personal matters where possible. . We invite you to join our team to venture into the unknown to bring new and exciting experiences to gamers.
 



  





 Walker Labs is committed to inclusion and diversity. We ensure we give equal opportunities to all of our employees and provide a safe workplace where everyone is valued and heard — without regard to race, colour, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, or other characteristics.
 



 If this role doesn’t quite match what you’re looking for we would still love to hear from you and how you feel you can bring value to our team and project.

title: Strategic Account Manager - Telco
description:
**Description**
*Position at Wind River*
**About Wind River**
 Wind River is a global leader in delivering software for mission-critical intelligent systems.
   

  

 For more than four decades, the company has been an innovator and pioneer, powering
   

  

 billions of systems that require the highest levels of security, safety, and reliability. Wind
   

  

 River helps customers across automotive, aerospace, defense, industrial, medical, and
   

  

 telecommunications industries solve complex technology challenges on their journey
   

  

 toward the new intelligent machine economy.
   

  

 The company’s software powers generation after generation of the safest, most secure
   

  

 systems in the world. Examples include playing a key role in NASA space missions such
   

  

 as Artemis I, the James Webb Space Telescope, and multiple Mars rovers. We’ve
   

  

 achieved recent 5G milestones, including the world’s first successful 5G data session with
   

  

 Verizon and building one of the largest Open RAN networks in the world with Vodafone.
   

  

 The company has received industry recognition for its technology innovation and
   

  

 leadership and for its workplace culture, including global Great Place to Work certification
   

  

 and being named a “Top Workplace” for ten consecutive years. If you want to be part of
   

  

 a unique culture where the lived experience is based on our cultural attributes of growth
   

  

 mindset, customer focus, and diversity, equity, inclusion & belonging, come join us and
   

  

 help advance the future software-defined world.
   

  

**About The Opportunity**
 Strategic Account Manager, Telecoms & Networking Sector
   

  

 Reports to: VP EMEA Telco
   

  

**The Job**
 The Wind River telco sales team is a power-house in our organization, ensuring customers
   

  

 engage in collaborative and strategic, long-term partnerships, allowing them to unlock the
   

  

 full potential of Wind River solutions.
   

  

 We are looking for a Strategic Account Manager with a strong entrepreneurial
   

  

 background and proven track record of achieving targets and building client trust. The
   

  

 successful candidate will be required to engage clients at the most senior levels and must
   

  

 therefore have had real presence, exceptional communication and interpersonal skills
   

  

 and an ability to forge long lasting customer relationships.
   

  

**What You’ll Do**
 Reporting to the VP of Telco Sales, EMEA, the role will have responsibility for
   

  

 developing, fostering and maintaining long term strategic business relationships in key
   

  

 target accounts. The ultimate goal is for Wind River to be the premier provider of
   

  

 Distributed Edge Cloud solutions and services within the European Telco market targeting network infrastructure and telco cloud supporting both ORAN and other network workloads. You will also work collaboratively with the Wind River telco Ecosystem consisting of Major NEPS such as Samsung, Nokia, Fujitsu, and Ericsson but also HW providers such as Intel, Dell, and HPE.
   

  

**What Will You Do**
* Develop, build and grow strong presence within target accounts and become a


 trusted advisor to all customer touch points
   

  

* Establish long-terms sales and account management strategy as well as


 implanting tactical approaches to realize that strategy
   

  

* Inspire the field teams (Engineering, Pre- Sales, Customer Success) to execute


 passionately against that vision.
   

  

* Position Wind River in all direct sales engagement, negotiations and RFPs.
* Understand client business models, including technology problems they have and


 working to solve
   

  

* Create and drive strategic revenue growth plans through a solution selling sales


 plans
   

  

* Collaborate with Global sales colleagues to establish and share best


 practices for continuous improvement
   

  

**Who You Will Work With**
* A team of colleagues across Wind River, supporting you to achieve your strategic


 vision and revenue goals. This will include pre-sales technical experts,
   

  

 professional services, management, post-sales technical support and dedicated
   

  

 sales administration.
   

  

* Telco sales teams within Wind River, collaborating on best practices, sales


 enablement and tools to effectively execute company goals and revenue targets
   

  

* You will engage with both internal and external senior executives to review


 business
   

  

**What Are The Requirements**
* Strong and comprehensive understanding of the Telco & Networking sector,


 gained through a minimum of 10 years of experience within sales and account
   

  

 management (ideally in the Cloud and Open-Source software business)
   

  

* Major account planning experience, involving the negotiation of large deals
* Significant experience as an individual contributor, consistently exceeding


 assigned quota
   

  

* Ability to work effectively with senior management.
* Ability to operate in a matrix environment.
* Deployment of solution-selling sales approach to technical and executive-level


 decision makers, using creative business thinking and thought leadership
   

  

* Proven experience dealing with complex business and software development


 processes
   

  

* Strong communication and interpersonal skills


**Desirable Personal Characteristics**
* Drive, Passion, Curiosity
* Honest with High Integrity
* Team Player
* Strong Leadership
* Focused and Committed
* Planning & Organizing
* Communication


**Benefits & Perks**
* Birthday and Volunteer Time off
* Competitive Benefits Package
* Life and Disease Insurance
* Annual Medical Check-up
* Selective Working Hour
* Employee Assistance Program


 Wind River is an Equal Opportunity Employer with a commitment to diversity. We prohibit discrimination based on race, color, religion, gender, national origin, age, disability, veteran status, marital status, pregnancy, gender expression or identity, sexual orientation, or any other legally protected status.

title: 3rd line supporttekniker som vill ta nästa steg
description:
Har du erfarenhet av att arbeta som 3rd line suppporttekniker och vill ta nästa steg i din IT-karriär? Då kan vi på Centric hjälpa dig att ta nästa steg och axla roller som bland annat systemadministratör, Junior Databasadministratör eller digital workplace ansvarig hos en mängd olika företag och myndigheter runt om i Stockholm.
 



  





 Som konsult på Centric får du en trygg anställning och samlar på dig värdefull arbetslivserfarenhet på uppdrag hos våra kunder. Din konsultchef stöttar dig i din utveckling där du hela tiden fyller på med nya erfarenheter och kunskaper. En utmärkt möjlighet att göra karriär.
 



  





**Dina arbetsuppgifter** 




  





*Exempel på roller:* 




**Systemadministratör** 




 En systemadministratör, även känd som sysadmin, är en IT-professionell som ansvarar för att hantera och underhålla en organisations datorsystem och nätverksinfrastruktur. Deras huvudsakliga uppgift är att säkerställa att dessa system fungerar smidigt, effektivt och säkert. En systemadministratör spelar en viktig roll i att hålla organisationens IT-infrastruktur i gott skick och säkerställa att användarna kan arbeta effektivt och säkert. Rollen kan variera beroende på organisationens storlek och krav, och sysadmin kan specialisera sig inom specifika områden som nätverk, säkerhet eller databaser, beroende på organisationens behov.
 



  





**Databasadministratör** 




 En databasadministratör, ofta förkortad som DBA, är en IT-professionell som specialiserar sig på att hantera och underhålla databaser inom en organisation. Deras huvudsakliga uppgift är att säkerställa att databaser fungerar korrekt, är optimerade för prestanda och hålls säkra. Databasadministratörer spelar en kritisk roll i att säkerställa att organisationens data är korrekt och tillgängligt när det behövs. De måste ha en god förståelse för databasteknik, säkerhet och prestandaoptimering. Rollen kan variera beroende på den specifika databastypen och organisationens behov, och DBA kan specialisera sig inom relationella databaser, NoSQL-databaser eller andra databasteknologier.
 



  





**Din profil och kvalifikationer** 



* Minst 3 års erfarenhet av att arbeta med 2nd eller 3rd line support
* Har kunskaper inom serveradministration i en blandad IT-miljö
* Har mycket goda kunskaper i Azure AD
* Lång erfarenhet av djupare felsökning av klienter och servrar
* Har grundläggande kunskaper och intresse för databaslagret
* Har erfarenhet av att hantera brådskande ärenden och incidenter i ett ärendehanteringssystem



  





*Meriterande* 



* Körkort
* Ansvarat för onboarding av ny personal
* Har vana att driva interna projekt i en Servicedesk



  





**Vad vi erbjuder** 




 På Centric får du de verktyg du behöver för att nå dina mål. Vi erbjuder alla våra konsulter kvalificerade utbildningar och certifieringar inom den senaste tekniken. Vi tycker nämligen att våra medarbetare hela tiden ska fortsätta att utvecklas. Därför erbjuder vi dig möjligheten att lägga upp en individuell utbildningsplan, där vi bekostar såväl studiematerial som själva certifieringarna. Under din utveckling kommer vi matcha din kompetens mot rätt uppdrag i takt med att du avancerar. Vi genomför regelbundet spännande aktiviteter där du som konsult får möjlighet att träffa och umgås med dina kollegor under roliga och avslappnande former.
 



  





 Centric är ett IT-företag med 380 anställda, med kontor i Stockholm, Göteborg, Malmö, Linköping och Örebro. Vi specialiserar oss på uthyrning av generalister och förmedling av specialister samt erbjuder outsourcing och systemlösningar inom retail. Vi är medlem i Almega Kompetensföretagen och följer deras tecknade kollektivavtal med Unionen.

title: Dynamics 365 F&O Solutions Architect
description:
We are looking for a Dynamics 365 F&O Architect specialized in finance and bank integration to join the Solutions Team for the Renewable Energy Portfolio section of an important Swedish holding with headquarters in Netherlands.
 


  

  


 The Dynamics 365 Architect will be responsible for designing and deploying Dynamics 365 solutions that meet the business requirements of our base accounting, purchase to pay process and reporting in different countries. The Dynamics 365 Architect will work closely with stakeholders to understand their business needs.
 


  

  

  

  


**Location:** 
 Hybrid (Leiden office)
 


  

  


**Types of contract** 
 : Freelance, Full-time or contract to hire
 


  

  


**Working Hours/Schedule:** 
 9:00 – 17:00
 


  

  


**Additional Employee Benefits:** 
 13th month bonus salary
 


  

  


**Language Requirement:** 
 Fluent in English (written and spoken)
 


  

  

  

  


**Responsibilities:** 



  

  

  
* **Architecture Design:** 
 Design and drive the Dynamics 365 architecture that meets the business requirements of the organization.
  
* **Technical Documentation:** 
 Create and maintain technical documentation, including design specifications, test plans, and deployment plans.
  
* **Collaboration:** 
 Collaborate with other architects and developers to ensure consistent and sustainable solutions integrated with other systems and applications.
  
* **Resource Management:** 
 Manage resources, including people, financial capital, material, and digital information to maximize efficiency and performance.
  
* **External Resources:** 
 Manage external resources during the development of portfolio solutions, ensuring delivery according to the defined architecture and hand-over plans.
  
* **Continuous Learning:** 
 Stay current with Dynamics 365 features and capabilities, identifying opportunities to leverage new functionality to improve business processes.
  
* **Risk Management:** 
 Identify and mitigate technical risks associated with Dynamics 365 implementations.
  


  

  

  

  


**Requirements:** 



  

  


**Education:** 
 University degree in computer science, finance, or a related field.
 


  

  


**Experience:** 



  

  

  
* 3+ years of experience with Dynamics 365 F&O architecture.
  
* 5+ years of experience as a cloud-based solutions architect.
  


  

  


**Technical Skills:** 



  

  

  
* Strong understanding of Dynamics 365 F&O accounting, reporting, and purchase to pay modules.
  
* Experience developing Dynamics 365 solutions across multiple countries and business units.
  
* Strong understanding of data modeling and database design principles.
  
* Experience integrating Dynamics 365 solutions with other systems and applications
  


  

  


**Soft Skills:** 



  

  

  
* Excellent communication and collaboration skills.
  
* International experience and understanding of cultural differences.
  
* Strong problem-solving and analytical skills.
  


  

  

  

  


**Language Skills:** 



  

  

  
* Fluent in English (written and spoken), with the ability to work across language barriers.

title: Embedded Software Engineer
description:
**Do you find the future of automation and robotics exciting?  Do you enjoy iterating solutions in order to find new or improved interfaces or ways of doing things? If so, Emoco Labs can be the perfect workplace for you!** 





  
 




  





**About Emoco Labs** 
  
 




 Emoco Labs is an automation software and hardware company focused on providing a comprehensive platform for building, deploying, and managing automation solutions. Our platform aims to simplify the process of development and operation by offering a range of tools and services. At our in-house workshop, we develop a wide array of technologies for automation solutions and robots, including mechanics and electronics. Our technology stack includes web applications, real-time communication services, 3D web presentations, WebRTC services, and e-commerce. 
 




  





**Our vision: Simple and sustainable automation for everyone** 

  
 





 Our ambition is to create tools that lower the threshold for automation by making it simpler, cheaper, and more accessible to everyone—from small businesses and schools to labs and the industry. We offer entrepreneurs knowledge, resources, and services that enable them to grow, produce, and invest locally where they operate. 
 




  





**About our automation platform** 

  
 





 Emoco offers a cloud-based development environment where users can collaborate on design and development. Our platform includes tools for coding, testing, and debugging automation applications. We also provide infrastructure for receiving and transmitting real-time data, which can be used to improve performance, predict maintenance needs, and optimize operations. 
 




  






 Emoco provides a hardware abstraction layer based on the ROS 2 standard, allowing developers to write software that works with a variety of automation hardware without managing the specific details of each component. This abstraction makes it easy to integrate different sensors, actuators, and controllers, which is crucial for creating complex, interconnected systems that can interact seamlessly. 
 




  





**About the role** 
  
 



 We are looking for an
 **Embedded Software Engineer** 
 to join our growing team—a challenging and creative role that offers both variety and excellent development opportunities. 
 



  





 At Emoco Labs, your commitment to results is what matters—functionality, stability, reusability, and security. As an Embedded Software Engineer with us, you will be an important part of our journey as we launch and grow the company together with our team and customers. 
 



  





**Your responsibilities will include:** 
  
 


* Enhance our automation server that is based on IMX8, Linux and ESP32.
* Evaluate new devices and integrate them in our automation HW portfolio.
* Develop ROS2 software and add new parts to our automation platform.
* Make robots, sense, move and act.
* Build self-stearing applications using SLAM
* Designing, building, and maintaining efficient, reusable, and reliable code (C/C++, Python).
* Playing an active role in defining our development processes and systems architecture.
* Collaborating with a team of smart and kind colleagues.



  





 Emoco Labs also offers great future career opportunities—with us, you can take the next step as an expert, architect, team lead, or product owner. 
 



  





**A few words from Elin Goertz, Co-founder and CTO** 
  
 



*"Emoco is a friendly, entrepreneurial, and diverse workplace where different skills and experiences are valued. We understand that work and life must be in balance. We know that we get the best results when our different personalities and strengths are combined with a shared interest in our job and our company's purpose. We support each other, but we also take responsibility for our own professional and personal development and growth. That is how we create a great workplace and a thriving business together."* 
  
 



  





**About you** 
  
 



 We believe that you are curious, self-driven, and enjoy being part of a fast-paced team. You are a great problem solver and stay up to date within your technical scope.  You are accustomed to consuming microcontroller datasheets. You feel confident designing and writing firmware from scratch or digging into a Linux driver. You're not afraid to pick up a soldering iron if required. You take pride in creating reusable and reliable technical solutions, being both creative and detail-oriented. 
 



  





**Requirements:** 
  
 


* Experience working as an embedded engineer
* Proficiency in C/C++ and Python
* Good knowledge in Linux
* Good communication skills in English



  





**It's a plus If you also have:** 
  
 


* Experience with ROS 2
* Experience from industrial applications
* Knowledge of robotics and automation
* Interest in or experience with electronic design in CAD
* Knowledge about TSN, Canopen, BLDC motors



  





**How to Apply** 
  
 



 Apply through LinkedIn or by sending an email. 
 



 Please note that you need to be eligible to work and live in Sweden. 
 



  





**Contact Us** 
  
 



 If you have questions about Emoco Labs or the job, please contact: 
 



  





**Elin Goertz** 
  
 



 Email: elin.goertz@emoco.com 
 



 Phone: +46 723 251 351 
 



  






 Emoco labs AB (
 
 https://emoco.com
 
 ) is a subsidiary of Rector AB (
 
 https://rector.se
 
 ). Rector is known for developing disruptive technology - one example is Neonode, the first touch-based smartphone. 
 




  





 We look forward to hearing from you!

title: Kommunikatör
description:
**Kommunikatör med ansvar för den externa kommunikationen** 

  





  





 Som kommunikatör hos oss har du en nyckelroll i hur vi uppfattas externt. Din främsta uppgift är att planera, driva och genomföra externkommunikationen. Du är spindeln i nätet som formulerar och paketerar våra budskap, så fler kan ta del av hur vi bidrar till ett hållbart samhällsbyggande. Vi har höga ambitioner, fina kundsamarbeten och är stolta över våra projekt och självklart arbetar du nära våra arkitekter. Du fungerar som ett stöd när arkitekterna behöver kommunikationshjälp men det är också viktigt att du självständigt kan driva arbetet så den externa kommunikationen stöttar vårt varumärke, våra övergripande mål och vår vision.
 



  





**ANSVARSOMRÅDEN:** 



* Tillsammans med tf. kommunikationschef ansvarig för att externkommunikationen är i linje med affären och varumärket.
* Tillsammans med affärsansvariga och tf. kommunikationschef planera externkommunikationens fokus på lång och kort sikt.
* Ansvar för webben och webbens utveckling.
* Ansvarig för kommunikationen i våra sociala kanaler – planering, produktion och publicering.
* Ansvarig för att kvartalsvisa nyhetsbrev produceras och skickas ut.
* Ansvarig för att den grafiska profilen följs.
* Kommunikativt stöd till arkitekterna i samband med presentationer, anbud mm.
* Stöd vid marknadsaktiviteter.



  





  





**FÖR ATT LYCKAS MED ARBETET HAR DU:** 



* Cirka 5 års erfarenhet inom kommunikationsbranschen.
* Stor vana vid att identifiera, formulera och paketera budskap med hjälp av text, bild och/eller rörligt på ett sätt som skapar nyfikenhet och intresse från målgrupperna.
* Stor vana från att göra komplicerade texter/resonemang lättillgängliga och intressanta för relevanta målgrupper.
* Erfarenhet av att driva kommunikationen i sociala medier, med fokus på Instagram och LinkedIn.
* Viss erfarenhet av och känsla för formgivning.
* Vana vid att arbeta i organisationer där kommunikationsarbetet hänger på bidrag från personer som inte arbetar med kommunikation.



  





  





**SOM PERSON SÖKER VI DIG SOM ÄR:** 



* Driven i att planera, producera, förankra, och följa upp extern kommunikation med fokus på egna kanaler (webben, Instagram, LinkedIn, nyhetsbrev).
* Kreativ i att hitta infallsvinklar, sätt och forum att beskriva verksamheten, projekt och annan kommunikation så den blir relevant och intressant för målgruppen.
* Språkligt stark med känsla och viss kunskap om formgivning.
* Engagerad, prestigelös och van vid att samarbeta över kompetensgränserna.
* Van vid att arbeta med Adobe Creative Cloud, framförallt InDesign, Illustrator, Photoshop/Lightroom och Premiere Pro. Erfarenhet av arbete i After Effects är meriterande. Du bör även ha goda kunskaper i WordPress och vara van vid att hantera verktyg för digitala nyhetsbrev. Utöver detta hanterar du Office-paketet obehindrat.
* Det är en stor fördel om du är insatt i hur arkitekt- och/eller samhällsbyggarbranschen fungerar.



  





  





**OM TJÄNSTEN** 



* Omfattning: Heltid
* Placering: Stockholm
* Tjänst: Tillsvidareanställning (6 månaders provanställning)
* Startdatum: ASAP.



  





  





**ANSÖKAN** 




 Deadline för ansökan är 4 oktober 2024. Vi kommer intervjua löpande under processens gång så skicka gärna in din ansökan så fort du har möjlighet. 
 



 Mejla in ditt personliga brev och CV till rekrytering@awlark.se. 
 



 Har du frågor kring tjänsten hör gärna av dig till Charlotte Mörner Stein, tf. kommunikationschef, charlotte.morner-stein@awlark.se eller 0733-676606.

title: Service Delivery Manager
description:
*Vill du arbeta i gränslandet mellan verksamhet och teknik? Här erbjuds du en nyckelroll i en dynamisk arbetsmiljö där du stödjer verksamheten och driver digitaliseringsinitiativ framåt!* 




  





**Om företaget** 




 Unionen är Sveriges största fackförbund och verkar för tjänstemän på den privata arbetsmarknaden. Deras vision är att skapa trygghet, framgång och glädje i arbetslivet. Unionen har nationellt kontor på 23 orter med cirka 1000 medarbetare. I Stockholm arbetar du tillsammans med 600 kollegor i moderna lokaler med tillgång till gym, mitt i Stockholm City. Kontoret präglas av en prestigelös och välkomnande kultur där gemenskap och trygghet värderas högt.
 



  





 Denna roll tillhör sektionen IT-tjänster, där flera grupperingar finns. Du ingår i teamet för arbetsplats och intern servicedesk. Förutom molnplattformar ansvarar sektionen även för drift, nätverk samt verksamhetsapplikationer som hanterar utveckling och förvaltning av ett stort antal IT-tjänster. Dessa grupperingar samarbetar tätt både internt inom enheten och med verksamheten samt leverantörer.
 



  





 Vid sidan av IT-tjänster finns sektionen Digital Utveckling, som ansvarar för mer utvecklingsintensiva IT-tjänster såsom medlemshantering (Dynamics), digitala kanallösningar, Business Intelligence och mer. Dessutom finns centrala funktioner som övergripande IT-arkitektur, IT-säkerhet och sourcing.
 



  





**Arbetsuppgifter** 




 Som Service Delivery Manager säkerställer du att Unionens verksamhet har tillgång till användarvänliga, säkra och effektiva arbetsplatsverktyg. Du har ett övergripande ansvar för Unionens klientmiljö med tillhörande applikationer och hårdvara, samt för den lokala infrastrukturen på Unionens regionkontor.
 



  





 Huvudsakliga ansvarsområden:
 



 • Säkerställa ett effektivt samarbete med kravställare och mottagare av tjänsterna, samt paketera och styra leveransen av tjänsterna ur ett system- och leverantörsperspektiv.
 



 • Agera teknisk expert inom ditt område i nära samarbete med IT-supporten, samt stötta arkitekter och projektledare i arbetet med att uppfylla både funktionella och icke-funktionella krav.
 



 • Definiera vision och strategi för arbetsplatstjänsterna, samt ta fram roadmaps och hantera, prioritera och följa upp backlog.
 



 • Säkerställa en governance-struktur med rätt forum, deltagare och aktiviteter.
 



 • Arbeta nära verksamheten och tillsammans med ansvarig för den digitala arbetsplatsen fungera som en naturlig kontaktyta.
 



 • Ansvar för leverantörsavtal och leverantörsstyrning. Koordinera verksamhetens behov, krav och beroenden med övriga team inom IT.
 



 • Genomföra omvärldsbevakning av nya teknologier och leverans modeller.
 



 • Ansvara för budget och kostnadsuppföljning.
 



  





**Utbildning, erfarenhet och personliga egenskaper** 




 • Fler års arbetslivserfarenhet av förvaltning och livscykelarbete med klienter, konferensutrustning, skrivare och IoT.
 



 • Erfarenhet av Microsofts klienthanteringsplattformar (SCCM och Intune), EntraID, Azure och Active Directory.
 



 • Kunskap inom applikationspaketering.
 



 • Erfarenhet av ServiceNow eller andra samarbetsverktyg.
 



 • Flera års erfarenhet av att leda och ansvara för leverantörsstyrning och avtalshantering.
 



 • Erfarenhet av budgetarbete, inklusive fakturahantering och budgetansvar inom din leverans.
 



 • Erfarenhet av IT-säkerhetsarbete kopplat till klient och operativsystem.
 



 • Flytande svenska och engelska i tal och skrift.
 



 • Meriterande med kunskap inom GDPR, informationssäkerhet eller infrastruktur.
 



  





 Vi söker dig som brinner för att göra skillnad – och det kommer du verkligen kunna göra här! Ditt verksamhetscentrerade tankesätt och din förmåga att kommunicera och bygga förtroende är värdefulla egenskaper. Genom kontinuerlig dialog med interna kollegor, konsulter och leverantörer kan du driva förändring effektivt.
 



  





 Din förståelse för hur förändring påverkar organisationer och människor gör att du kan tillämpa best practice för att uppnå positiva resultat. Du är strukturerad och vet när kvalitet bör prioriteras. Du trivs i en ansvarstagande roll och är duktig på att sätta både kortsiktiga och långsiktiga mål för att upprätthålla en hög nivå på både ditt och ditt teams arbete.
 



  





 Vi uppskattar din positiva attityd och din förmåga att kommunicera och skapa entusiasm. Här får du arbeta med lika positiva och kunniga kollegor som ser fram emot att välkomna dig till en både spännande och utmanande roll!
 



  





**Övrig information** 




**Start:** 
 Enligt överenskommelse
 



**Plats:** 
 Olof Palmes Gata 17, Hötorget, Stockholm. Möjlighet att arbeta på distans två till tre dagar i veckan.
 



**Lön:** 
 Enligt överenskommelse, övriga villkor enligt kollektivavtal
 



**Facklig kontakt:** 
 Tobias Levin,
 **tobias.levin@unionen.se** 
 , 08-504 155 37
 



  





 Den här tjänsten är en direktrekrytering vilket innebär att rekryteringsprocessen sker genom Brillante och du anställs direkt hos Unionen. Vi gör ett löpande urval, så skicka in din ansökan redan idag!
 



  





 Vid frågor eller funderingar, kontakta ansvarig rekryterare Elice Öhman via
 **elice.ohman@bravura.se** 
 eller 076-721 49 82.

title: Software Engineering Analyst -
description:
**Want to drive digital change in automotive?**


At Volvo Cars, we are making bold digital visions come true. We aim to lead in the automotive world by creating a digital ecosystem built around making our customers' lives less complicated. Now we are looking for curious, creative people who want to change the world through innovative thinking.

  


**HIL Engineer to Complete Electrical HIL**


**About us – your new teammates**  

We, at Complete HIL Development, are responsible for developing and maintaining electrical HIL rigs (Hardware in the Loop) at complete vehicle level. Our HILs are used for integration and verification of both HW and SW in early phases. The purpose of HIL is to stimulate the system and its components to believe they are in a real vehicle with all their dynamics. This is achieved by simulating environmental models that execute in real time on dSpace SCALEXIO simulators. We secure that the HIL rigs can be updated with new technology to support future projects such as electrification and autonomous vehicles.

  

  

**What you’ll do**  

As a HIL engineer you will work in a cross-functional HIL team, with continuous improvements regarding test automation, modeling in Simulink and integration of HIL solutions. You get a broad understanding of Volvo Cars Vehicle systems and Electrical functions. You will also work with other groups at Volvo, our suppliers and create a wide network. The role will give you varied and challenging work as it involves both hardware and software. Together with your colleagues, you will further develop the HIL concept to enable test automation and “Continuous Integration”. Working in a highly effective team, you strive to continually develop yourself and the team; you contribute to developing new ways of working to be at the forefront of industry.

  

  

**Some of your main responsibilities**  

• Initiate, lead and drive the building, developing, maintaining and testing of HIL rigs for the complete vehicle platform  

* Support in performing verification in vehicles at system or functional level
* Be part of team efforts to develop solutions across platforms
  


**Do you fit the profile?**  

You are, as a person, curious and like to solve problems. You are flexible and can handle multiple parallel tasks at the same time. You are social and work effectively together with others to achieve results. You are driven, quality conscious and like questions about the improvement of methods and processes.  

* Master’s degree or B.Sc. grade within electronics, physics, mechatronics or similar education.
* At least 3 years of relevant work experience
  


**Technical/Behavioral/Interpersonal Competences:**  

• Experience in design and development of electronic components and systems both HW and SW as well as end-to-end functional testing/verification  

* Design, develop, and test electrical systems, including wiring harnesses, power distribution systems, and control units integrated in the Complete HIL rigs.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate electrical and electronic components into Complete HIL rigs, ensuring compatibility and reliability.
* Conduct thorough analysis and troubleshooting of electrical systems, identifying and resolving issues to meet performance and safety standards.
* Implement communication protocols and networking solutions to enable seamless connectivity between onboard systems, sensors, and external devices.
* Stay updated on industry trends, emerging technologies, and regulatory requirements to drive innovation and ensure compliance with relevant standards.
* Provide technical support and guidance to internal teams and external partners throughout the product development lifecycle.
* Experience in Test-driven development, creating Test description/Specification
* Model Based development in Simulink/Stateflow
* Design and development of Graphical User Interfaces for test benches/rigs
* Worked with building HIL and automated test systems in dSpace rigs
* Experience from any of the following domains:


o Hybrid and/or electric vehicle development  

o AD/ADAS  

o Infotainment or Body functionality  

o HMI and Connectivity  

o Powertrain and High voltage systems  

o Brake systems  

* Verification in vehicles at system or functional level
* Experience working with scripting and test automation (Python, CI, Jenkins)
* Vehicle communication (CAN, LIN, ETH) or other communication protocols
* Highly skilled in Matlab, Python or RobotFramework
  

 **Familiar with**  

o Working with version control systems (Gerrit)  

o Working with dSPACE software (ConfigurationDesk, ControlDesk, ModelDesk, etc…)  

o Building dSPACE HW (SCALEXIO Customized Rack and/or LabBox, compatible IO boards)  

o Working with traffic simulation environments is meritorious (IPG CarMaker, VTD Vires, or similar)  

o Communication protocols (e.g., CAN, LIN, Ethernet) and networking principles for automotive applications  

o Automotive safety standards (e.g., ISO 26262) and regulatory requirements (e.g., EMC, EMI).  

* Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to work effectively in a fast-paced, collaborative environment.
* Strong communication skills with the ability to convey complex technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders.
  

  

**Way of working:**  

• Skilled in Agile/SAFe framework and release experience according to Agile VPDS.  

* Ability to secure product flow and deliveries.
* Able to organize the work for a team and coach team members.
* Effective communication and collaboration skills.
* Ability to work with Continuous Improvements in the team.
* Skilled in Continuous Integration
  


**Application:**


Please send in your application before 6th of October 2024. For questions about the recruitment process please contact recruiter Keerthi Veeraraghavan at keerthi.veeraraghavan@volvocars.com.

  


**Who are we?**


Everything we do starts with people. Our purpose is to provide freedom to move, in a personal, sustainable and safe way. We are committed to simplifying our customers’ lives by offering better technology solutions that improve their impact on the world and bringing the most advanced mobility innovations to protect them, their loved ones and the people around them.

  

  

Volvo Cars’ continued success is the result of a collaborative, diverse, and inclusive working environment. The people of Volvo Cars are committed to making a difference in our world. Today, we are one of the most well-known and respected car brands, with over 43,000 employees across the globe. We believe in bringing out the best in each other and harnessing the true power of people. At Volvo Cars your career is designed around your talents and aspirations so you can reach your full potential.
